This guide was written by TUGs and is totally free, but if you want to support my work use: https://www.youtube.com/user/HydroxXTV
I am marking EVERY Elite quest and dungeons as optional in this guide. Especially on release you should do them!!! You'll easily find groups for elite quests and dungeons.
Talk to Lou the Cabin Boy and have him sail you to Scalawag Isle.
Text: Talk to Lou the Cabin Boy and have him sail you to Scalawag Isle.

Name: Use your Fish Bladder so you can breathe underwater.
Text: Use your Fish Bladder so you can breathe underwater.

Name: Go to the tavern. Talk to Olga and give her 1 gold to get Jack Adams drunk. Collect the debt from the passed out Jack Adams.
Text: Go to the tavern. Talk to Olga and give her 1 gold to get Jack Adams drunk. Collect the debt from the passed out Jack Adams.

Name: Run to [G37.93, 74.81Howling Fjord]
Text: (Need Coords for this, please post them on Curseforge/Discord,thanks!) Swim northeast to an island with the NPC Juniper on it. Wait for the boat to come.

Name: Head to the front of the ship (still on the top floor) to The Big Gun. When the ship starts attacking Sorlof, keep using The Big Gun to kill Sorlof. Once he's dead, jump off and loot Sorlof's Booty.
Text: Head to the front of the ship (still on the top floor) to The Big Gun. When the ship starts attacking Sorlof, keep using The Big Gun to kill Sorlof. Once he's dead, jump off and loot Sorlof's Booty.

Name: Easy" Elite quests incoming. Do NOT use your long-CD abilities on the pirate
Action: use them on the bear(additionally you can heal up after the pirate jumps down!!!). Get 100% Life and mana and Flask/Buff/Food/Potion/Scrolls are useful here."
Wowhead: Easy" Elite quests incoming. Do NOT use your long-CD abilities on the pirate
column11: use them on the bear(additionally you can heal up after the pirate jumps down!!!). Get 100% Life and mana and Flask/Buff/Food/Potion/Scrolls are useful here."

Name: Head south to the docks and talk to Alanya next to the flying machine and take the flight.
Text: Head south to the docks and talk to Alanya next to the flying machine and take the flight.

Name: Use the flying machine to return to Scalawag Point.
Text: Use the flying machine to return to Scalawag Point.

Name: Swim northeast to the island again and wait for the boat to arrive.
Text: Swim northeast to the island again and wait for the boat to arrive.
